name: firefly-iii
description: Firefly III is a self-hosted personal finance manager designed for budgeting, expense tracking, and visual reporting. It supports multiple accounts, currencies, APIs, and detailed categorization. GDPR-compliant for full financial privacy.
features: Finance: Personal finance manager, Budgeting and expense tracking, Visual reporting. Complete financial control.
Multi-Account: Support multiple accounts and currencies. Global finance management.
Categorization: Detailed expense categories. Organized finances.
API Access: Integrate with other tools. Extensible platform.
GDPR-Compliant: Full financial privacy. Your data stays yours.
Self-Hosted: Complete ownership of financial data. Maximum security.
